name: Aero Club del Ecuador
about: Aero Club del Ecuador, founded on 20 February 1931, is the oldest and most prestigious civil aviation school in Ecuador. With over 90 years of experience, the club has graduated more than 1,200 pilots and continues to be a leader in aviation training. Based in Guayaquil, the school offers a wide range of courses including private pilot, commercial pilot, instrumental enablement, multi-engine enablement, and flight instructor training. The club operates from the International Airport José Joaquín de Olmedo and utilizes a fleet of Cessna and Piper aircraft. Known for its extensive infrastructure, Aero Club del Ecuador also provides additional services such as a school for cabin crew and aviation mechanics, ensuring comprehensive training for all its students. The club's commitment to excellence and its rich history make it a trusted institution for aspiring pilots in Ecuador and beyond.
services:
